author: Special Correspondent
text:
Six held for waylaying merchant

The Pulianthope Police arrested six persons on Saturday in connection with a waylaying incident near Pattalam Clock Tower a month ago.

According to the police, Murugan, son of Arumugam, a resident of Perambur, runs a silver jewellery store in Sowcarpet.

On February 4, Murugan was carrying around 50 silver crowns for delivery near the Tower, when the six persons identified as Venkatesan, Satish Kumar, Yoganandam, Mohammmed Faisul Karni, Benjamin alias Sundarraj, and Velmurugan of Vysarpadi, waylaid him, robbed him of the crowns, and fled the scene.
title: Six persons held for waylaying silver merchant
